analysis.key_quote: Reclassification of these career civil service employees to Schedule F will politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce capabilities to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and the impact on scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
